[Portrait]Southern Sky Deserter
[Dialog]Pursued even yet, when we are fled
so far? Have the gods no mercy?{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]Is that a scouting party from the
Order of the Southern Sky?{END}

We're through fighting! You will 
not force us to return!

We're going home! Better to live
in the streets than to die in them!

We've had our fill of blood and
death!{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]We do not pursue you!

Pray heed my words! It is
not our wish to fight!{END}

Aye, that much I'll believe. Better
to strike us down cleanly when
our backs are turned!
Do not think us so green as to
fall for your tricks! We've seen
our share of those as well!{END}

[Portrait]Southern Sky Deserter
[Dialog]That man... Does he not have the
look of the one on the handbill?{END}

What of it?{END}

It's him-the heretic!
I'm certain of it!

If we returned with him, might
they not pardon our desertion?{END}

You'd return to camp?{END}

Consider it! The capture of a heretic
is near as grand a feat as the
capture of an enemy commander!
If we delivered them his head, do
you not think they would reward
us with leave to return home?{END}

The men who captured that general
-were- dismissed honorably...{END}

If we are to return to our homes,
let us do so with our heads held
high!
Were we to return now, it would be
to a life of skulking in the shadows.{END}

You speak true. Let us return
with him!

Or at least with his head. It's not
long for those shoulders anyway.
He is a heretic, after all!
Come, let this be our final battle!
Our freedom is bought with this
godless man's blood!{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]I understand the need to hold one's own life
dear. But to hold it so far above all others...{END}
